name: Roco-Ball
description:
Controls - Mouse Click to rotate ball

Roco-Ball is a "endless runner" type game, where the player's colours have to match up with the incoming walls to unlock the gates and get points.

Roco-Ball is currently a work in progress game and I'll be updating it as often as I can.

If you have any feedback / questions etc. please feel free to let me know.

Music used in Roco-Ball is created by RoccoW -http://freemusicarchive.org/music/RoccoW/
